title: Simple CRUD Fullstack application with Nuxt3
subtitle: Nuxt3/Typescript
description: Simple CRUD Fullstack application with Nuxt3 which shows shows a list of questions with answers. The application includes basic CRUD operations which creates, reads, updates and also deletes questions/answers. Registered users can only have access to perform the above operations, so the application also includes basic authorization and authentication.

title: Simple REST API with Node.js and Express
subtitle: Node.js/Express/Typescript
description: REST API with Node.js and Express, which includes some basic endpoints for authentication and authorization.

title: IKEA website clone created with Vue and TailwindCSS
subtitle: Vue / Vuex / TailwindCSS
description: Application shows a list of wardrobes, which can be filtered/sorted and added to the cart shop. The information on this project is static and is not coming from an API.

title: Selenium Page Object Model in Javascript & Jest
subtitle: Javascript / Selenium
description: Demonstrates a way of organizing Selenium Tests Using the Page Object Model for testing a simple registration page on wizzair.com
